data.comment: Today's referee, Chris Kavanagh, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Man City at Old Trafford.
In the minute 2, Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Man Utd's Luke Shaw is whistled for offside at Old Trafford.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 5, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
Throw-in Man City.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
In the minute 11, Man Utd attack but Victor Lindelof's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Man City at Old Trafford.
Free kick Man City.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Man City in the half of Man Utd.
Chris Kavanagh waits before resuming play because Fred for Man Utd is still down.
Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Fred for Man Utd is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Man City close to the penalty box.
Chris Kavanagh awards Man Utd a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Raheem Sterling (Man City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Man City throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Man Utd are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 24, In Manchester, Bruno Fernandes of Man Utd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
In the minute 26, Gabriel Jesus of Man City gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man City.
In the minute 27, Important block from the Man Utd defence as John Stones fires in a strike for Man City.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 29, Man City to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Man Utd's Paul Pogba gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Man City defender.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
In the minute 31, Man Utd's Harry Maguire attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Man City.
In the minute 33, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Riyad Mahrez of Man City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 35, Man City's Kevin De Bruyne misses with an attempt on goal.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Man City at Old Trafford.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Victor Lindelof (Man Utd) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
Throw-in Man Utd.
In the minute 43, Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
Man Utd push forward at Old Trafford and Mason Greenwood gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Man City defence.
Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Man City's area.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Man City in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Chris Kavanagh blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Manchester.
Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marcus Rashford for Man Utd is whistled offside.
In the minute 51, Man City have a dangerous throw-in.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Throw-in Man Utd.
In the minute 52, In Manchester Man Utd attack through Mason Greenwood. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Man City at Old Trafford.
Important block from the Man Utd defence as Fernandinho fires in a strike for Man City.
In the minute 54, Man Utd are coming forward and Marcus Rashford gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Chris Kavanagh awards Man City a goal kick.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
In the minute 60, Man City are pushing forward but Fernandinho's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
In the minute 61, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man City.
Chris Kavanagh awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Man Utd in Manchester.
In the minute 65, Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Pep Guardiola (Man City) is making a first substitution, with Ferran Torres replacing Riyad Mahrez.
In the minute 68, In Manchester, Kevin De Bruyne of Man City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Can Man City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man Utd's half?
In the minute 74, Anthony Martial is on a sub for Mason Greenwood for Man Utd.
Throw-in Man City.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
Man Utd will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Man City.
Harry Maguire (Man Utd) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Kevin De Bruyne (Man City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
Anthony Martial for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 84, In Manchester Man City's Raheem Sterling is caught offside.
Free kick Man City.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 87, Fernandinho (Man City) has received a yellow card from Chris Kavanagh.
In Manchester Man Utd drive forward through Bruno Fernandes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Man City have a goal kick.
At Old Trafford the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Man Utd needs to be cautious. Man City have an attacking throw-in.
Man City's Rodri gets in a shot on goal at Old Trafford. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Chris Kavanagh blows against Man City's Gabriel Jesus for offside.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
